heroSubtitle1: A Sacred Encounter with Ancestral Medicines
heroSubtitle2: We invite you to a space of deep healing, care, and transformation.
upcomingCeremoniesSubtitle: Join us on a journey of healing and self-discovery. Each ceremony is a unique opportunity to connect with your inner self.

editCeremonyDescription: Make changes to the ceremony details. Click save when you're done.
addCeremonyDescription: Complete the details to create a new ceremony.
deleteCeremonyConfirmDescription: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the ceremony.
mediaRequiredDescription: Please provide a media URL or upload a file.
pastCeremoniesSubtitle: Listen to the stories of those who have walked this path before you. Each video is a window into transformation and healing.
addVideoDescription: Add a new testimonial video to the collection.
videoFormUrlOrUpload: You must provide a URL or upload a video file.
deleteVideoConfirmDescription: This will permanently delete the testimonial video.
loginSubtext: Sign in to continue your journey.
googleSuccessDescription: You have signed in with your Google account.
errorMinLength: The {{field}} field must be at least {{count}} characters.
registerSubtext: Join our community to access exclusive content.
registerSuccessDescription: We've sent you a verification email.
promptRegisterDescription: Create an account to save your progress, book ceremonies, and access exclusive content.
whatIsAyahuascaDescription: Ayahuasca is an ancestral Amazonian medicine, a sacred brew made from the mixture of two plants: the Banisteriopsis caapi vine and the leaves of the Psychotria viridis shrub. Known as the 'vine of the souls,' it is a powerful tool for introspection, healing, and consciousness expansion.
howAyahuascaWorksDescription: Ayahuasca works on a physical, emotional, and spiritual level, cleansing the body of toxins and the mind of negative patterns. It facilitates a deep dialogue with our inner self, revealing hidden traumas, fears, and blockages to heal them from the root.
spiritualMasterDescription: More than a substance, Ayahuasca is considered a spiritual teacher that guides the participant on a journey of self-knowledge. It teaches through visions, emotions, and revelations, offering a deeper understanding of life, the universe, and our place in it.
ayahuascaBenefitClarityDescription: Release limiting thought patterns and find a new perspective on life.
ayahuascaBenefitHealingDescription: Access and process repressed memories and emotions in a safe and supportive environment.
ayahuascaBenefitConnectionDescription: Deepen your connection with yourself, others, and the universe.
groupCeremonyDescription: Share the healing energy in a circle of trust. The group acts as a mirror and support, amplifying the individual experience.
privateCeremonyDescription: An intimate and personalized experience, designed to address your specific needs in a space of total privacy and focus.
guidesPageSubtitle: Meet the hearts and minds that will accompany you on your journey. Each of our guides brings deep wisdom, compassion, and an unwavering commitment to your well-being.
deleteGuideConfirmTitle: Are you sure you want to delete this guide?
editGuideDescription: Modify the guide's information. Click save to apply changes.
preparationProcessDescription: Intention and diet are the foundation of your journey. Here the connection begins.
ceremonyProcessDescription: A sacred space to open the heart and receive the medicine.
experienceProcessDescription: Navigate your visions and emotions with our guidance and support.
integrationProcessDescription: Translate your revelations into lasting changes for your life.
dietSubtitle: Physical preparation is as important as mental preparation. A clean diet allows the medicine to work with greater clarity and depth.
allowedFoodsList: Fresh fruits and vegetables (except citrus and very ripe ones)
Whole grains like rice, oats, and quinoa
prohibitedFoodsList: Red meats, pork, and cold cuts
Refined sugars, excess salt, and spicy foods
Alcohol, caffeine, and other recreational drugs
mentalPrepSubtitle: Open your mind and spirit to receive the teachings of the medicine. Intention is your compass on this journey.
meditationDescription: Take time to calm the mind and connect with your inner self.
intentionsDescription: What are you looking to heal, understand, or transform? Define your purpose.
reflectionDescription: Write down your thoughts, fears, and hopes before the ceremony.
emotionalHealingDescription: Ayahuasca can bring intense emotions to the surface. Allow yourself to feel them without judgment. Trust that you are held in a space of love and safety. Being willing to be vulnerable is the first step towards deep release.
whatToBringTitle: What to Bring to the Ceremony?
whatToBringSubtitle: Prepare your nest for a night of introspection and comfort. These items will help you feel safe and relaxed.
comfortItemsList: Blanket and pillow or yoga mat
A personal object of power or significance
preparationCtaDescription: Proper preparation is key to a transformative experience. Discover everything you need to know to prepare physically, mentally, and spiritually.
followUsText: Follow us on Instagram for daily inspiration:
writeToUsText: Or write to us directly on WhatsApp:
contactCommunityText: Become part of our growing community. Share, learn, and grow with us in a space of respect and love.
errorSelectVideoToUpload: Please select a video to upload.
